subject: Colleges and Universities
College Athletics
NCAA Lacrosse Championships
Lacrosse
lead_paragraph: Fired in the wake of a sexual-assault case involving Blue Devils players that turned out to be bogus, Mike Pressler has the lacrosse program at tiny Bryant University rolling in Division I.
snippet: Fired in the wake of a sexual-assault case involving Blue Devils players that turned out to be bogus, Mike Pressler has the lacrosse program at tiny Bryant University rolling in Division I.
